authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params.description: params defines the x/gov parameters to update. NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

MsgUpdateParams.title: Msg Update Params
MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.title: Coin
cosmos.base.v1beta1.Coin.description: Coin defines a token with a denomination and an amount. NOTE: The amount field is an Int which implements the custom method signatures required by gogoproto.

min_deposit.description: Minimum deposit for a proposal to enter voting period.

max_deposit_period.description: Maximum period for Atom holders to deposit on a proposal. Initial value: 2 months.

quorum.description: Minimum percentage of total stake needed to vote for a result to be  considered valid.

threshold.description: Minimum proportion of Yes votes for proposal to pass. Default value: 0.5.

veto_threshold.description: Minimum value of Veto votes to Total votes ratio for proposal to be  vetoed. Default value: 1/3.

min_initial_deposit_ratio.description: The ratio representing the proportion of the deposit value that must be  paid at proposal submission.

proposal_cancel_ratio.description: The cancel ratio which will not be returned back to the depositors when a proposal is cancelled.

proposal_cancel_dest.description: The address which will receive (proposal_cancel_ratio * deposit) proposal deposits. If empty, the (proposal_cancel_ratio * deposit) proposal deposits will be burned.

expedited_voting_period.description: Duration of the voting period of an expedited proposal.

expedited_threshold.description: Minimum proportion of Yes votes for proposal to pass. Default value: 0.67.

expedited_min_deposit.description: Minimum expedited deposit for a proposal to enter voting period.

burn_vote_quorum.description: burn deposits if a proposal does not meet quorum

burn_proposal_deposit_prevote.description: burn deposits if the proposal does not enter voting period

burn_vote_veto.description: burn deposits if quorum with vote type no_veto is met

min_deposit_ratio.description: The ratio representing the proportion of the deposit value minimum that must be met when making a deposit. Default value: 0.01. Meaning that for a chain with a min_deposit of 100stake, a deposit of 1stake would be required.

cosmos.gov.v1.Params.title: Params
cosmos.gov.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the x/gov module.
